alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; De Kalb; Gentry; Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:44AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Doniphan, Buchanan, Worth, central Clinton, Gentry, Nodaway, Andrew and DeKalb Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Burlington Junction to near Fillmore to Elwood to near Weston. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Maryville, Savannah, Plattsburg, Albany, Gower, Elwood, Stanberry, Maysville, Country Club Villa, Country Club, King City, Grant City, Stewartsville, Agency, Hopkins, Dearborn, Ravenwood, Union Star and Osborn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 31 and 62. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; De Kalb; Gentry; Nodaway; Worth
